Blog.post: Summer school is a total bore. I only have one class after all. Stupid admissions office. I have to go in at 10:07, so I'm stuck at home with nothing to do. I can't go anywhere, my favorite music store Penny Lane isn't open till 11: something or rather. And if that weren't enough, drumroll please... No. Cute. Guys. In. My. Class. I have nothing to look at when I'm done with my work. But there is one guy I like so far. He's in my bff's class. Curse you Kim!!!! LOL j/k. ~Still Bored. Katie.

Grrr, I have summer school Monday. Curse you English Honors. CURSE YOU!!!!! Meh I went to three different graduations, including my own. BORING. I hung out with my man slave and some random neighborhood...uh, hoods? Yeah. Boring still. Nothing, I repeat, nothing, good happened. Was sooooooo freaking boring. ~Katie (dying from boredom)

I hung out at Andrea's Geeze her brother's hawt *drools* Meh, whatever. I tried to sk8 again but...feel flat on my back ....again. *grumbles* I miss my friends already. It's alot harder than I thought. Sk8ing I mean. I used to be good then I suck. It kinda gives me an excuse to have Chris attempt to teach me and hold me. *blushes* Everything hurts....blah..... Adios, Katie.
http://www.xanga.com/private/home.aspx?user=Logic_is_a_myth Sorry was bored. I fell on Andrea's skateboard and scratched up my elbows.

I got Chris' Edgar's and Dannys's ^ ^ Here are my favorite little notes some people wrote in my yearbook. "Beaner" -Phillip "The White Boy" ~lol hahaha he calls himself the white boy because...he is. The only one in the school. Hey Katie, guess what? Orlando Bloom is the hottest!!! :) Well, hope you had a great year and maybe I'll see you in AHS :) Take care, never change." - ~Mandy's cool, she has an unhealthy obsession with Mr. Bloom. ^ ^ "Curse you! Curse you as long as you live. Curse you until the end of the world. Curseyoucurseyoucurseyou CURSE....you're lucky I'm tired now. Have a good summer." -Hunter Huang ~Insider joke but still very funny. "Hey Kate, You are a strange person, but in a good way. Have a good summer have fun and don't do anything I wouldn't do." -Brain Mejia ~Omgomgomgomgogmogmogmogmg ....wait? Don't do anything he won't do? Very short list. "Hey Katie I'm gonna miss you and Squirrel Man." -James a.k.a. Lil Buddy. ~Squirrel Man knows all!!!!!!! "Hola Katie, have a good summer and keep up with the guys. P.S. U r a strange person." -Chris Ramos. ~Brian's cuz, he's cuter. With his lil pink sk8board....he's not gay. Thankfully he's punk. "Hey Katestah, Have a great summer fo' shizzle." -Danny Yu. ~0_o ....Yeah.....whatever, he's cute. The other ones were generic "Have a good summer" "See you at AHS" (Alhambra High School) meh... ~Kata the Mexican chic who can't sk8 without falling.

Don't laugh, my school year still isn't over. Thursday it officialy ends. Whatever. I got my year book. I need these boys to sign. 1. Marcos Sanchez *** 2. Danny Yu ** 3. Chris Ramos ******* 4. Edgar Ramerize ** 6. Eliseo Villen....somthing ****************** (I know he doesn't go to my school but...) **************************************** (lol) 7. Hector Campos **

I got back from the mountains a while back...It was so fun. My aunt just turn 60... the old fart. j/k ^ ^ She lives in the San Bernidino mounts. Went to the creek got wet. Learn about my future husband...I mean...future husband? Now in list form: 1) He sniffs his brother's magical hair-styling stuff. (His bro has greaser style hair.) That explains his drop in grades. Mwahaha. 2)His last name is Villen...something. It means village in Spanish. I forget the rest. 3) I have cheese in my pocket and damnit I feel special. 4)....The end Lol till something interesting happens, Katie ^ ^

Unfortunately, I lack a good social life. So I'll entertain you with a song and dance...haha no. I bet your wondering am I really a punk? Well...so how about them Lakers. Joking! (They suck by the way. I know I'm from Los Angeles and all but really) I'm working on the whole discovering-what-I-am. And for the last time Nick (that is if you are reading this) I am not a Goth. Just clarifying that. Some people say I'm close to emo others say I'm sk8er. (shows how much they know me. When I sk8 I spend more time with my face kissing the floor) So, That's it. Hopefully...Raccoon alarm clock of doom!!! Sorry, bored. adios random people. Katie the confused girl. ^ ^

Yup, finally, though it makes me sad. I made so many friends and I got to touch a mohawk. ^_^ Mohawks make me happeeeeeee. Ima gonna miss the boys too. Haha lol. Me and my sick mind. *shakes head* lol ~Kt

I finally got a freaking phone. Whoo? So far it's just been there, I never call anyone not even that cute pizza dude, Derrick to get a pizza. I don't call relatives, I don't call friends. Who's bright idea was this? Balls. Heehee ^_^ I threw a ball at my love. Mwahahaha that will teach him..for something...I forgot what though. Meh whatever. I got his older brother to throw the ball at him too. Good times. Good times. *shakes head with a dreamy gaze* I'm not with him. So to speak I'm not allowed and we're just friends. JUST FRIENDS. And I happen to have the hots for him. lol ~kt

So I haven't blogged in a while, xanga is easier to post on than this for some reason. Yesterday was my birthday...whoo? Fourteen!!! Summer school is boring still. Well, that was fun. Still need to talk to Eliseo, we started talking ya know? But I haven't been to grandma's since the fourth so....GREASE IS THE WORD!!!!!! ~Katie
